title: Basic Requirements To Start Your Own Pig Farm

subtasks: Obtain a suitable space for the pigs (intensive system recommended)
Build a feeding trough for the pigs
Ensure a solid flooring to prevent damage from pigs
Provide a water source (trough, wallowing area, or spraying system)
Install a water tank for storing water
Equip a pumping machine or generator to supply water
Prepare tools for feeding and maintenance (buckets, shovels, etc.)
